properties.description: Sets border width, style and color.
properties.name: border
properties.values: See border width, style, and color

properties.description: Set the bottom border width style, and color.
properties.name: border-bottom
properties.values: See border width, style, and color

properties.description: Set the bottom border width
properties.name: border-bottom-width
properties.values: thin, medium, thick, or length value

properties.description: Set the border color
properties.name: border-color

properties.description: Set the left border width style, and color.
properties.name: border-left
properties.values: See border width, style, and color

properties.description: Set the left border width
properties.name: border-left-width
properties.values: thin, medium, thick, or length value

properties.description: Set the right border width style, and color.
properties.name: border-right
properties.values: See border width, style, and color

properties.description: Set the right border width
properties.name: border-right-width
properties.values: thin, medium, thick, or length value

properties.description: Sets border style
properties.name: border-style
properties.values: none, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset

properties.description: Set the top border width style, and color.
properties.name: border-top
properties.values: See border width, style, and color

properties.description: Set the top border width
properties.name: border-top-width
properties.values: thin, medium, thick, or length value

properties.description: Sets Border width.
properties.name: border-width
properties.values: thin, medium, thick, or length value

properties.description: Determines where floating elements are allowed.
properties.name: clear

properties.description: Specifies how text is wrapped and where it is aligned.
properties.name: float

properties.description: Height of element
properties.element-type: Block elements and IMG, INPUT, TEXTAREA, SELECT, and OBJECT
properties.name: height

properties.description: Set element margin width. A single value sets all margins, two values set top and bottom, four values set top, right, bottom, and left margins.
properties.name: margin
properties.values: auto, length value, or percent value

properties.description: Set element bottom margin
properties.name: margin-bottom

properties.description: Set element left margin
properties.name: margin-left

properties.description: Set element right margin
properties.name: margin-right

properties.description: Set element top margin
properties.name: margin-top

properties.description: Space between border and content.  A single value sets all sides, two values set top/bottom and left/right, three values set top, right/left, and bottom, and four values set top, right, bottom, and left.
properties.name: padding

properties.description: Space between bottom border and content.
properties.name: padding-bottom

properties.description: Space between left border and content.
properties.name: padding-left

properties.description: Space between right border and content.
properties.name: padding-right

properties.description: Space between top border and content.
properties.name: padding-top

properties.description: Width of element
properties.element-type: Block elements and IMG, INPUT, TEXTAREA, SELECT, and OBJECT
properties.name: width
properties.values: auto or a height value in length or percentage

properties.description: Set background color, repeat, image, attachment, or position.
properties.name: background
properties.values: See background-color, background-image, background-attachment, background-repeat, background-position

properties.description: Determines if the background image is fixed or scroll.
properties.name: background-attachment

properties.description: Sets the background color.
properties.name: background-color

properties.description: Sets the background image.
properties.name: background-image

properties.description: Sets the background image initial position.
properties.element-type: Block and IMG, INPUT, TEXTAREA, SELECT, and OBJECT
properties.name: background-position
properties.values: top, center, bottom, left, center, right, or percent values

properties.description: Sets how the background image is repeated.
properties.name: background-repeat

properties.description: Sets element color.
properties.name: color

properties.description: Sets the type of element.
properties.name: display

properties.description: Sets list style type and/or position.
properties.name: list-style

properties.description: Sets image to be used as the list item marker.
properties.name: list-style-image

properties.description: Sets list style type.
properties.name: list-style-type
properties.values: circle, disc, decimal, lower-alpha, lower-roman, none, square, upper-alpha, upper-roman

properties.description: Sets where the marker is place relative to the text and its wrapping position.
properties.name: list-style-position

properties.description: Sets treatment of spaces inside the element.
properties.name: whitespace

properties.description: Used to define font properties
properties.name: font
properties.values: See font-family, font-size, font-style, font-variant, and font-weight.

properties.description: Used to define font family to use
properties.name: font-family

properties.description: Used to define font size to use
properties.name: font-size
properties.values: xx-small, x-small, small, medium, large, x-large, xx-large, larger, smaller, length value, or percent value

properties.description: Used to define font style to use
properties.name: font-style

properties.description: Used to determine whether to use normal or small caps
properties.name: font-variant

properties.description: Sets font weight.
properties.name: font-weight

properties.description: Sets the space between characters.
properties.name: letter-spacing

properties.description: Sets the height of lines.
properties.name: line-height
properties.values: normal, a number, a percent of the element font size,

properties.description: Sets the alignment of text.
properties.name: text-align

properties.description: Sets the special decoration attributes of text.
properties.name: text-decoration

properties.description: Sets the element's first line amount of indentation.
properties.name: text-indent

properties.description: Transforms text to one of the set values.
properties.name: text-transform

properties.description: Sets vertical position.
properties.name: vertical-align
properties.values: baseline, sub. super, top, middle, bottom, text-top, text-bottom, or percent value

properties.description: Sets extra space between words.
properties.name: word-spacing
